TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapSchemaMember extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents certain attributes of a XSD <> element in a WSDL document for generating classes from the document.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The SoapSchemaMember class is used by the Wsdl.exe tool while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. Instead of using this class directly, use Wsdl.exe.
The SoapSchemaMember class has properties that correspond to the name and type attributes of a WSDL part element. The class is used only when a WSDL document specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets a value that corresponds to the name attribute of the WSDL part element.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property corresponds to the XML `name` attribute of the XML element `<wsdl:part>`. For more information about the element, see [http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl](http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl).
The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaMember> class is used by the Wsdl.exe tool while generating classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document that specifies SOAP encoding. Instead of using this class directly, use Wsdl.exe.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that corresponds to the type attribute of the WSDL part element.
Docs.value: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> that corresponds to the XML type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property corresponds to the XML `type` attribute of the XML element `<wsdl:part>`. For more information about the element, see [http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl](http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl).
The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaMember> class is used by the Wsdl.exe tool while generating classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document that specifies SOAP encoding. Instead of using this class directly, use Wsdl.exe.
